text: Just curious, because it is a question I get a lot in my area, and I would like to hear what you usually say: doesn't AI upend your whole research topic? I.e. can't you "just refine" an existing foundational model to create the diagrams, and then use your symbolic methods to ensure it actually fulfills the required conditions? (I am not trying to be mean)
